quooz.client.gui.utility

Class RemoteHandlers

  • java.lang.Object
    • quooz.client.gui.utility.RemoteHandlers

  • public class RemoteHandlers
extends java.lang.Object
    The Class RemoteHandlers contains the remote object that will be called from the client.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      GameHandlerInterface getGameHandler() 
      static RemoteHandlers getInstance() 
      PlayerHandlerInterface getPlayerHandler() 
      QuestionHandlerInterface getQuestionHandler() 
      static void reset()
      Reset the remote instance: called every time there's a connection issue.
